metadata.description: DESIRE + GREED + SUPERPOWERS = CLOBBERING TIME! In this Startling Story four-issue series, award-winning writer/artist Evan Dorkin and Eisner-nominee Dean Haspiel craft a fantastic noir, exploring a few days gone wrong in the life of the ever-lovin' blue-eyed THING.
metadata.name: Startling Stories: The Thing - Night falls on Yancy Street
